Quick search

pyutil.itersrc module¶

pyutil.itersrc.iter_source_code(paths)[source]¶

Iterate over all Python source files in C{paths}.

Taken with almost no modifications from pyflakes. This would be a great function to call with os.listdir(‘root’) output.

@param paths: A list of paths. Directories will be recursed into and

any .py files found will be yielded. Any non-directories will be yielded as-is.

param paths:
